last_episode_to_air.name: A Matter of Time (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview:
Simon, Crystal, and Glae try to retrieve the time machine after it's been stolen so they use a device to activate the time machine and bring back Harry Houdini.

Glae is getting headaches and starts to disappear, at a fast rate.

Thus, Simon must choose between the secrets and confidentiality of the time machine, and saving a friend from not existing.

name: Mentors
overview: Mentors was a 30-minute Canadian fantasy series that aired on Canada's Family Channel. It was broadcast on Discovery Kids in the United States and Latin American.

episodes.name: The Genius
episodes.overview: Albert Einstein helps Oliver deal with his parents' divorce.

episodes.name: The Truth is in Here
episodes.overview: Ghostly incidents are happening in the school. To help figure out who is responsible for them Oliver and Dee summon Sir Aurthur Conan Doyle. Oliver keeps questioning this punk looking girl who just seems to appear everywhere. Is she a ghost? Is she responsible for the ghostly incidents?

episodes.name: Her Grace Under Pressure
episodes.overview: Dee is running for Student Council but bad rumours about her are going around the school, so she summons Queen Elizabeth I for political advice.

episodes.name: Dear Diary
episodes.overview: Dee reads Anne Frank's diary entries and decides that Anne deserves 36 hours of free time from the attic hideaway. Anne Frank cannot believe how free it is where Dee and Oliver live from her attic hideaway. Anne starts to really like or should I say love Oliver. Dee and Oliver decide to take Anne to the movie theatre. During the movie Anne steps out of the theatre and meets this punk guy in the theatre's video arcade and finds that there's a lot of goodness in him. So that tought Dee and Oliver how to find goodness in people. At the end of the episode before Anne's 36 hours run out she says that it has been the best 36 hours she has ever had in her life.

episodes.name: The Glory Trail
episodes.overview: Oliver and Dee summon natve American Sacagawea to help in an expedition to expose a refinery that is secretly causing river pollution.

episodes.name: Right Place, Right Time
episodes.overview: Oliver accidentally causes himself and Dee to be transported back in time by 24 hours, giving them an opportunity to right a wrong.

episodes.name: Nothing But Net
episodes.overview: Dee summons the inventor of basketball, Dr. James Naismith, to coach her on winning an important game.

episodes.name: Father's Day
episodes.overview: After Oliver has a row with his dad, Dee brings the man forward in time as a teenager, hoping that they will learn to better relate to each other.

episodes.name: The Book of Love
episodes.overview: Oliver finds Dee being around this other guy a lot. Oliver decides to bring back Casanova because he thinks that he will be able to give him some tips on attracting girls. Unfortunately Casanova is giving Oliver really bad advice. When Oliver follows Casanova's advice, he makes a huge fool of himself.

episodes.name: Stranger in a Strange Land
episodes.overview: When a financial crisis causes Dee's mom to question her faith, Dee brings Moses from the past to advise her, not realizing that she has summoned the young Moses, when he was but a humble shepherd rather than a great leader.

episodes.name: The Fire Ship
episodes.overview: In danger of losing Visicron to a corporate software pirate, Oliver summons the famous 18th Century pirate Black Bart to help him fight fire with fire.

episodes.name: Klondike Daze
episodes.overview: Oliver adds another module to Visicron to speed it up. When Oliver tries to bring back Jack London, the Visicron instead takes Oliver to the time and place Jack London is right now. Oliver has to try and find a way back, so Dee asks Simon to help find a way to bring Oliver back. Meanwhile Oliver keeps altering the future and weird things keep happening in the present.

episodes.name: Seer and Now
episodes.overview: Plagued by a recurring dream, Dee summons famous prophet Nostradamus to advise her on what it means.

episodes.name: Future Tense
episodes.overview: Oliver is just about to delete Visicron before going to college, but then he is transported into the future by an old man. Oliver gets accused by the old man of being careless with time travel. Oliver and the old man watch clips of past episodes on a screen so that Oliver can defend himself and show the man what good Visicron has done. The old man convinces Oliver he shouldn't delete Visicron and then Oliver gets sent back to the present. We later find out that the old man was really Oliver himself as an old man in the future. In the end right before Oliver leaves to Montreal, Quebec, Canada to go to college he gives Visicron to his 12 year old cousin Simon.

episodes.name: The Good, The Bad and the Ollie
episodes.overview:
Simon brings Oliver back home from the university using the VisiCron to help him with an invention. But there is a glitch in the VisiCron and Oliver is split into two, one nice and the other one is naughty.

The nice one cannot tell a lie but the naughty one is seeking revenge on all the people that treated him bad in high school so Crystal and Simon need to find him before he does something really bad.

episodes.name: Such Stuff As Dreams Are Made Of
The Tao of Hockey
episodes.overview: Simon's hockey team isn't doing that well so he uses the time machine to bring confusious back to the present. At first the hockey team doesn't like him but after he teaches them a few things they are ready to play and win

episodes.name: A Matter of Time (2)
episodes.overview:
Simon, Crystal, and Glae try to retrieve the time machine after it's been stolen so they use a device to activate the time machine and bring back Harry Houdini.

Glae is getting headaches and starts to disappear, at a fast rate.

Thus, Simon must choose between the secrets and confidentiality of the time machine, and saving a friend from not existing.
